contentRule: Only NUS undergraduate students shall be eligible to participate in CREATION 2022.
To participate in CREATION 2022, participants can directly submit the design through Microsoft Form under Submission page, participants are not required to register for CREATION 2022
Registration for the challenge will open on 17 Jan 2022 and will close on 25 Feb 2022 18:00.
Participation in CREATION 2022 is FREE of charge.
The competition will take place from 17 Jan 2022 to 12 Mar 2022.
All dates and times referred to in these rules, the website and in any documents relating to or in connection with the competition, shall be in the Singapore time zone (GMT +8).
Each participant can choose to sign up for multiple challenges.

Each participant can submit multiple times per challenge before the deadline, but only the last submission will be taken and shortlisted by the CREATION committee and judged by a panel of judges during the closing ceremony on 12 March 2022.
All entries should fulfill the requirements specified in their respective challenge statements.
Finalists are required to pitch their final artwork to the panel of judges during the closing ceremony on 12th March 2022.

Unless in extenuating circumstances, finalists who are unable to attend the closing ceremony for the pitching session will be heavily penalized during the assessment or may face disqualification as well.
Deadline of submission of artwork is 25th February 2022. Entries after the given deadline will not be accepted.
The CREATION committee reserves the right to reject a submission that is submitted past the stipulated deadline.
Assessment criteria will vary among challenge statements.
The evaluation judging criteria for eligible submission are as follows:

contentRule.prizeName: Key Visual for NUS Commencement Class Giving 2023

details.criteriaDetails: The participants will be assessed based on the difficulty of the design techniques they use in their designs. More advanced and complex techniques will merit higher marks.
The participants will be assessed based on the creativity and innovation in their design.
The participants will be assessed based on how useful and suitable their design is for usage according to the problem statement.
The participants will be assessed based on whether the design fits the theme given in the problem statement.

contentRule: All entries should fulfil the requirements specified in their respective challenge statement. Participants' artwork will not be accepted if the challenge’s requirements are not met.
The decision of the judges will be final and binding.

Only participants who have participated in NUSSU commIT Cyberia 2021 and/or any of NUSSU commIT Adobe Photoshop Workshop in AY2021/2022 and/or any of NUSSU commIT Adobe Illustrator Workshop in AY2021/2022 will be considered for CREATION 2022 Newcomer Award.

ONE Newcomer Award will be given to ONE participant fulfilling the above criteria whose artwork is the judges’ favorite design among the 4 challenge statements and is not a winning entry for any of the challenge statements.

All participants can voluntarily share their CVs with the startups supported by NUS Enterprise. All participants may submit their CV under Submission page. With the submission should the participants consent to allow their CVs to be shared though. Please also note that the internship is not guaranteed, and the decision lies with the startup.
All artwork submitted for CREATION 2022 competition shall become the property of the sponsors for the respective problem statements.
Winning posters may be modified and used by sponsors for their personal usage.

CREATION committee reserves the right to amend these rules at any time. CREATION committee may also create rules, which will apply to a specific competition only. Participants are responsible for checking the relevant competition page for any updates to the rules. A copy of the latest version of the rules is made available at the website. By continuing to participate in CREATION 2022, participants signify their agreement to any updates to the rules.
CREATION committee reserves the right to disqualify any participant, if:
participant is found to have violated the rules; or
participant cheats or tampers with the operation of the CREATION 2022; or
participant cheats or tampers with the operation of the CREATION 2022; or

participant engages in conduct that is unlawful, offensive, or otherwise leads the CREATION committee to conclude that public association with the participant could cause controversy or generate any negative publicity for CREATION 2022 or its partners.
All prizes are non-transferrable and not exchangeable for cash.
